name: Audioflow
0:
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen”
”Alexa, turn Patio off”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use this skill to operate your Audioflow Smart Speaker Switch via the Amazon Alexa voice assistant.

You will need the 'Audioflow' app for iOS (Available from the App Store) or Android (Available from the Google Play Store).

Once you have your switch set up on your network using the app, you can use the cog 'Settings' icon to name your Zones and click the 'Enable Alexa' button to log-in to you Amazon Account and allow this skill to work.

After adding this skill to your Alexa Account and clicking the 'Enable Alexa' button in the app you would be able to control the zones of your switch by issuing ON and OFF commands against the zone names which you have set in the Audioflow app. For example if you have a zone named 'Dining' you can say "Alexa, turn on Dining".
